CustomField.formula: CASE(Weapon__c, "Sword", (Dexterity__c*0.5 + Strength__c*1.5) * Level__c/2, "Polearm", (Dexterity__c*1.5 + Strength__c*0.5) * Level__c/2, "Dagger", Dexterity__c*2.5*(Level__c/2), "Staff", (Intelligence__c + Wisdom__c*0.5) * Level__c/2, "Ax", Strength__c*2.5*(Level__c/2), "Deez Mits", Strength__c*Level__c/2, 6)
CustomField.label: Damage
